snippet: The former Raider defensive lineman was a terror, but he was a jovial terror, a handlebar-mustache-wearing rebel who enjoyed being on stage, in front of a camera for movies and commercials.
abstract: The former Raider defensive lineman was a terror, but he was a jovial terror, a handlebar-mustache-wearing rebel who enjoyed being on stage, in front of a camera for movies and commercials.

headline.main: Remembering Ben Davidson, Raider and Showman
